I'm not sure where the word "chaordic" comes from. I suspect that Dee W. Hock coined it in his book, Birth of the Chaordic Age.
 
 According to Wikipedia, Hock did coin the word, "The portmanteau chaordic is used in some philosophies to refer to a system that is simultaneously chaotic and ordered. The term was coined by Dee Hock."
 
 I haven't read the book.

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  Do Chaordic Structures Threaten Individuals?
